                                 EOFException,
                                 IOException

        Database
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if the table cannot be stored
        EOFException - if the database doesn't exist

                           throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                  IOException
        Retrieve the asked database
        Parameters:
        nameOfBase - name chosen by the user
        Returns:
        Database by retrieving the file in which the object is stored
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if the table cannot be stored
        EOFException - if the database doesn't exist
        FileNotFoundException - if the database doesn't exist
        IOException
